title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Russia collusion hoax has been debunked, CrowdStrike CEO testified under oath they couldn't prove Russians hacked DNC server. Marie Harf perpetuates the Russia collusion lie on Fox. Obama told the truth in October, 2016: You can't rig an American presidential election. The biggest scandal in American history is still alive. ChiComs vow to meddle in the 2020 election. Why Fox has liberal liars like Marie Harf. Leftists have hijacked science. Peace Corps medical director on Rush saying they've moved the goalposts on opening the country. For first time, Fauci wears mask, symbol of fear, standing behind Trump. Polling shows Democrats lockdown strategy is backfiring. Fauci looks muzzled in gigantic mask.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Fauci looked muzzled in gigantic mask. Georgia, Michigan lockdown stats. Blue-state governors are killing their state economies. Companies, citizens realizing they don't have to be located in big cities, pay high taxes and high rents. Cuomo is killing Broadway. White House press corps asks Trump about wearing masks. Georgia caller on flattening the curve. Vice President Pence calls the show to talk about the reopening of America, success in overcoming the coronavirus crisis.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Rush off for treatment the beginning of next week. The Obamas hated living the White House, Michelle made butlers stop wearing tuxedoes. Optimism vs. pessimism. Coronavirus cases decreasing as testing increases. Will Barr and Durham make the coup conspirators pay for what they've done? They all deserve the Manafort, Stone treatment. We don't know how close the coup came to suceeding. Trump is the cleanest, most investigated person in Washington history. Shannon Bream sends Rush a note about the Bush 43 Peace Corps medical director who commented on Rush. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
